name: Dove Intense Repair Conditioner
description:
Formulated with Keratin Actives, Dove Intense Repair Conditioner repairs the signs of damage to the hair surface. With continued use it penetrates the hair strands to nourish, making hair stronger.
Key Features: 
•        Nourishing conditioner for beautiful hair, resilient to daily damage
•        Nourishes to protect hair and prevent damage
•        Keratin repair actives immediately smooth surface of strands
•        Makes hair feel smoother, helps detangling and improves manageability
•        Gives instant results and maintains them, wash after wash
•        Hair treatment for damaged hair suitable for daily use *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
